title: The Chocolate and Coffee Bible
description: Over 300 delicious, easy-to-make recipes for total indulgence, from bakes to desserts, shown step by step in 1300 glorious photographs. Everything you need to know about chocolate and how to choose them, how to drink them and how to make delectable cakes, tarts, ice creams and other treats. Includes cakes, gateaux, tarts, pies, brownies, bars, breads, pastries, ice creams, cheesecakes, candies, edible gifts, and hot and cold drinks.
author: Catherine Atkinson
